items.content_html: Pear is a lightweight and easy-to-learn programming language designed for efficient file operations, data manipulation, and general-purpose scripting. With its simple syntax and powerful built-in functions, Pear streamlines the coding experience for automation and small applications.
items.title: Pear-Lang/PearLang: Pear is a lightweight and easy-to-learn programming language designed for efficient file operations, data manipulation, and general-purpose scripting. With its simple syntax and powerful built-in functions, Pear streamlines the coding experience for automation and small applications.

items.content_html: Anti-Scrape Shield is a lightweight library designed to protect your web applications from scraping attempts. It works with React, Vue, Angular, Svelt,Next and Remix applications.
items.title: AchrefHASNI/Anti-scrape-shield-js: Anti-Scrape Shield is a lightweight library designed to protect your web applications from scraping attempts. It works with React, Vue, Angular, Svelt,Next and Remix applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.
items.title: TAGCH/Workflow-Automation: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.

items.content_html: X-UI is a lightweight, user-friendly web panel designed for managing Xray configurations. Ideal for personal use, it streamlines the process of managing server configurations, making it accessible for everyone.

items.content_html: Hono-Auth is a lightweight authentication boilerplate created with Hono.js and Bun. It offers essential features and functionality for building secure and efficient web applications.

items.content_html: PR ewviewer is a simple, lightweight tool for reviewing GitHub Pull Requests. It streamlines the code review process by providing a clean interface to view and comment on diffs, see reviewer feedback, and manage multiple PRs efficiently.
items.title: brainstormforce/pull-request-reviewer: PR ewviewer is a simple, lightweight tool for reviewing GitHub Pull Requests. It streamlines the code review process by providing a clean interface to view and comment on diffs, see reviewer feedback, and manage multiple PRs efficiently.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient Inventory Management System that enables users to manage stock levels, track sales, and generate reports. Features include CRUD operations for inventory items, customer management, and export functionality. Built with modern web technologies to provide seamless and user-friendly interactions.
items.title: suhailabdaz/Stock-Ease: A lightweight and efficient Inventory Management System that enables users to manage stock levels, track sales, and generate reports. Features include CRUD operations for inventory items, customer management, and export functionality. Built with modern web technologies to provide seamless and user-friendly interactions.
